name: Cometoids
description:
• Red - I J K L (K to shoot)
  • Blue - W A S D (S to shoot)
  • Green - Arrows (Down to shoot)
  • Purple - Num Pad keys (2 to shoot)
  • Paddle - Protect your wall from the comets
  • Ship - Blast the asteroids
  • Website: https://portfolio.qeorge.games/play-cometoids/
    • Includes a link to a non-playable demo of the new asteroids
    • Includes a link to a playable demo of the new look for ships
